1315414662540861446.content: #bitcoin is the unit a account already, for crypto traders. most portfolios are bitcoin denominated. it's the only benchmark that matters, you want to know if your long/short/option/yield/alt trading strategy did better or worse, or you could have just held. not hodling is risk.

1315411965045428224.name: KatieMoussouris (she/her)
1315411965045428224.content:
Amid all your other apocalypses, please pay close attention to the end-to-end encryption one.

The 1st time they did this (look up crypto wars), it weakened e-commerce & all other web transactions for over a decade, enabling crime.

I wish we didn’t have to repeat these facts.
